snippet: Mr. McQuarrie transformed George Lucas’s rudimentary concepts and earliest scripts into lush, vivid images that became the visual core of the “Star Wars” saga.
abstract: Ralph McQuarrie, artist who transformed George Lucas’s rudimentary concepts and earliest scripts into lush, vivid images of intergalactic expanse and light-saber combat that became the visual core of the Star Wars saga, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. McQuarrie transformed George Lucas’s rudimentary concepts and earliest scripts into lush, vivid images that became the visual core of the “Star Wars” saga.

headline.seo: Ralph McQuarrie, Artist Behind ‘Star Wars,’ Dies at 82
headline.main: Ralph McQuarrie, Artist Who Helped Bring ‘Star Wars’ to Life, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Ralph McQuarrie, Artist Who Helped Bring ‘Star Wars’ to Life, Dies at 82
